mapper.insert: insert into member (email, pw, phone_num, name, thumbnail) values (#{email}, #{pw}, #{phone_num}, #{name}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: select pw from member where email = #{email}
select * from member m inner join friends f on m.email = f.friend_email where f.member_email = #{email}
select * from member m inner join friends f on m.email = f.friend_email where f.member_email = #{email} and m.name LIKE '%'||#{search}||'%'

select * from MEMBER m inner join FRIENDS f on m.EMAIL = f.MEMBER_EMAIL where f.FRIEND_EMAIL = #{email} and email NOT IN ( select a.FRIEND_EMAIL from FRIENDS a inner join FRIENDS b on a.FRIEND_EMAIL = b.MEMBER_EMAIL where a.MEMBER_EMAIL = b.FRIEND_EMAIL and a.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{email})
select * from FRIENDS where member_email = #{member_email} and FRIEND_EMAIL = #{friend_email}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set PW=#{pw}, phone_num=#{phone_num}, name=#{name}, thumbnail=#{thumbnail} where email=#{email}
